targets.queryText: WITH cur AS (SELECT market_value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), prev AS (SELECT market_value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) SELECT cur.market_value - prev.market_value AS value FROM cur, prev;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH cur AS (SELECT market_value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), prev AS (SELECT market_value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) SELECT cur.market_value - prev.market_value AS value FROM cur, prev;

targets.queryText: WITH cur AS (SELECT projected_monthly_income FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), prev AS (SELECT projected_monthly_income FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) SELECT cur.projected_monthly_income - prev.projected_monthly_income AS value FROM cur, prev;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH cur AS (SELECT projected_monthly_income FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), prev AS (SELECT projected_monthly_income FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) SELECT cur.projected_monthly_income - prev.projected_monthly_income AS value FROM cur, prev;

targets.queryText: WITH cur AS (SELECT forward_12m_total FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), prev AS (SELECT forward_12m_total FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) SELECT cur.forward_12m_total - prev.forward_12m_total AS value FROM cur, prev;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH cur AS (SELECT forward_12m_total FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), prev AS (SELECT forward_12m_total FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) SELECT cur.forward_12m_total - prev.forward_12m_total AS value FROM cur, prev;

targets.queryText: WITH cur AS (SELECT ltv_pct FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), prev AS (SELECT ltv_pct FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) SELECT cur.ltv_pct - prev.ltv_pct AS value FROM cur, prev;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH cur AS (SELECT ltv_pct FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1), prev AS (SELECT ltv_pct FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) SELECT cur.ltv_pct - prev.ltv_pct AS value FROM cur, prev;

targets.queryText: WITH latest_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM daily_holdings), prev_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date)), cur AS (SELECT symbol, market_value, weight_pct, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date)), prev AS (SELECT symbol, market_value, weight_pct, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date)) SELECT c.symbol, c.market_value - p.market_value AS mv_delta, c.weight_pct - p.weight_pct AS weight_delta, c.projected_monthly_dividend - p.projected_monthly_dividend AS income_delta FROM cur c JOIN prev p ON c.symbol = p.symbol ORDER BY abs(mv_delta) DESC LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM daily_holdings), prev_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date)), cur AS (SELECT symbol, market_value, weight_pct, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date)), prev AS (SELECT symbol, market_value, weight_pct, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date)) SELECT c.symbol, c.market_value - p.market_value AS mv_delta, c.weight_pct - p.weight_pct AS weight_delta, c.projected_monthly_dividend - p.projected_monthly_dividend AS income_delta FROM cur c JOIN prev p ON c.symbol = p.symbol ORDER BY abs(mv_delta) DESC LIMIT 10;
